A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Beautiful Visuals\, fantastic fighting scenes. Some fun comedic antics. And that's where the good ends. The story makes no sense and is in many ways senseless\, and useless. No background on anything from the war to character's stories. New characters are pointless and old characters are rewritten and not in a good way. I just don't understand what the hell I watched\, and that's after 3 viewings.
